cont.entity_a: Draws a bit of current from the USB port, requiring USB2 upgrade to avoid computer stalling.
Practically high definition, supporting 720p, although frame rate can slow down.
Outstanding color contrast and brightness levels with exposure adjustments.
cont.entity_b: Sharp image on user screen, but pixelated on the receiving end.

cont.entity_a: Easy to setup with built-in color and light features providing a great picture. Easy to install with many features, but flimsy on laptops. Installation is easy, but camera can crash certain operating systems.
cont.entity_b: Installation issues with software requiring multiple attempts. Easy to install and use, but attachment is loose on laptops.

cont.entity_a: Audio quality is poor, hindering communication despite high-speed internet. Good microphone performance with low light and echo control. Audio feedback issues near speakers.
cont.entity_b: Good directional live audio feature. Built-in microphone, but poor video and still picture quality.

cont.entity_a: Picture quality can be blurry with focal point issues.
cont.entity_b: Image quality not special compared to cheaper webcams.

cont.entity_a: The QuickCam Fusion lacks advanced image enhancement settings available in cheaper models. Automatic focus works well in varying lighting conditions, with face tracking feature. Requires resolution change for live calls on free services. Adjusts well to lighting conditions and sound environment. Wide lens coverage and adjustable camera.
cont.entity_b: Camera follows movement, keeping user centered in the picture. Auto focus cannot be adjusted manually, leading to focus issues.

cont.entity_a: Lacks TWAIN and WIA support in latest software, limiting integration with other software. Installation can cause system instability, such as B.S.O.D on certain laptops.
cont.entity_b: Detected inconsistently, often requiring a system restart. Incompatible with certain wireless network adapters.

cont.entity_a: Design suitable for flat panel monitors.
Video quality is great, but audio feedback issues near speakers.
cont.entity_b: Video quality is good with a fisheye effect.
